original_text: “Now his older son was in the field, and as he came and drew near to the house, he heard music and dancing.
korean_text: 맏아들은 밭에 있다가 돌아와 집에 가까이 왔을 때에 풍악과 춤추는 소리를 듣고

sentences.original_text: Now his older son was in the field
As he came and drew near to the house

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 음악 소리와 춤추는 소리를 들었다
